cab.content: it&ry Secret.14-16v . Fr"6m Secretary of State to Viceroy, Army Department, 3rd August 1920. ,125. Your telegram of 27th July, 9724. Reinforcements for Mesopotamia.Reference telegram from War Office to Mesopotamia, repeated India No. 85790, dated30th July. Please comply regarding despatch of additional troops. Please tele-graph reply clear the line to my telegram of 31st July, No. 62, regarding recall ofofficers. *
